title: The Landmark London makes two new appointments
text:
The Landmark London makes two new appointments The Landmark London makes two new appointments Details Category: Appointments Created on Wednesday, 19 August 2015 09:15 The Landmark London has announced two new appointments at the hotel. Joe Mensah joins as Director of Conference and Banqueting and will lead the team to deliver an outstanding level of service for all their guests. Joe has previously held senior positions at Jumeirah Carlton Tower, Intercontinental Hotels and Grosvenor House as well as the Institute of Directors and the Royal Albert Hall. He has a passion for events and the hospitality industry, and brings a great deal of knowledge and experience to the role. 
Anna Napora has also been announced as Human Resources Officer (Rooms). Anne has been at The Landmark London for over two years, holding various roles within the Food and Beverage team, including positions within the Gazebo, Mirror Bar, TwoTwentyTwo, Room Service and Winter Garden, as well as Training Manager for Food and Beverage. Anna has been activily developing her skills and will move roles to become part of the Human Resources Team this week. The Landmark London welcomes both Anna and Joe to their news roles at the hotel.
